About me

Sam Green studied computer science and multimedia at the University of Web Design. Years of experience have given Sam a unique angle to approach client projects.

Sam works mostly with startups and advises them on the best technology that is suitable for their project.

Sam helps you bring your vision to life with attention to detail and an unrivaled focus on quality.

Curious to know more? Check-out my portfolio or hire me
